mapper.update: update article set a_title = #{aTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, a_content = #{aContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} , a_coverImg = #{aCoverimg,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, a_signature = #{aSignature,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, a_addTime = #{aAddtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, a_synopsis = #{aSynopsis,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, a_sortId = #{aSortId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, a_sonId = #{aSonId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, a_label= #{aLabel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, a_num = #{aNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, a_browse = #{aBrowse,jdbcType=INTEGER}, boutique = #{boutique,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where a_id = #{aId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select a_id, a_title, a_content, a_coverImg, a_signature, a_addTime, a_synopsis, a_sortId, a_sonId,a_label,a_num,a_browse,boutique from article where a_id = #{aId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select a_id, a_title, a_coverImg, a_signature, a_addTime, a_synopsis, a_sortId, a_sonId,a_label,a_num,a_browse,boutique from article ORDER BY a_num
select a_id, a_title, a_content, a_coverImg, a_signature, a_addTime, a_synopsis, a_sortId, a_sonId,a_label,a_num,a_browse,boutique from article where a_sonId = #{sId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select a_id, a_title, a_content, a_coverImg, a_signature, a_addTime, a_synopsis, a_sortId, a_sonId,a_label,a_num,a_browse,boutique from article where a_title like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{title},'%')) or a_content like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{title},'%'))
select * from article where a_label like concat(concat('%',#{label},'%'))
